name: Modern React Search Components
description: Generate diverse search interface components with various interaction patterns, visual designs, and accessibility features for modern React applications

outputRequirements.structure: Single TypeScript React component file with proper imports, interface definitions, and export
qualityStandards: TypeScript compliant with proper type definitions
Accessible with ARIA labels and keyboard navigation
Performance optimized with React best practices

sophisticationLevels.name: Basic
sophisticationLevels.description: Simple search input with basic functionality

sophisticationLevels.name: Intermediate
sophisticationLevels.description: Enhanced search with autocomplete and improved UX

sophisticationLevels.name: Advanced
sophisticationLevels.description: Sophisticated search with filters, suggestions, and advanced features

sophisticationLevels.name: Revolutionary
sophisticationLevels.description: Cutting-edge search experience with AI-powered features

constraints: Must be valid TypeScript React component
Must work in modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
Must not use external UI libraries (build from scratch)
progressionStrategy: Each iteration should explore unique interaction paradigms and visual approaches while building upon search functionality patterns from previous iterations
successCriteria: Demonstrates clear innovation in assigned dimension

validationRules.validator: TypeScript compiler validation and React component structure check
Component renders and basic search operations function correctly

validationRules.description: Meets quality standards for sophistication level
validationRules.validator: Code quality, performance, and UX evaluation against level expectations
Innovation dimension exploration and differentiation from previous components
